body.codeblock: @public @buseventtype create json schema host_config as (action string, additional_information string, observer_id string, category string, create_time string, description string, event_code string, observer_id string, observer_name string, id string, observer_ip string, protocol string, receive_time string, severity string, listener string, source_id string, source_ip string, source_hostname string, source_mac string, source_port string, tags string, target_id string, target_ip string, target_hostname string, target_port string, target_mac string, timestamp string, user string)
